events.message: I received the wrong size shoes and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because they do not fit at all.
The customer's request mentions a refund due to wrong size shoes, so the case is categorized under Refund.
The support case was assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request regarding the wrong size product.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’ve read your message and I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the shoes.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the shoes are unused and in the original packaging for us to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 78451239. The shoes are brand new, unopened, and still in the original box as I just received them yesterday.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the shoes at no cost.
Thank you so much! That sounds perfect. I appreciate the prompt assistance with the refund and return shipping.
We have emailed you the shipping label. Once we receive the shoes, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have sent the shoes back and to update you on the refund status.
The refund has been completed successfully, and your case is now closed. Thank you for your patience throughout the process.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our customer support regarding the refund process.
